name: SkyCamp Multiplayer
description:
"This is a game that I made for my undergraduate thesis, using the Unity Game Engine"

The publication of this game on the itch.io platform has received approval from the university and lecturers.

This game was made in 6 - 8 months out of a total of 1 year of thesis work that I went through (2020 - 2021).

I developed this game myself inspired by the game "Minecraft Skyblock" which was applied in the "Pramuka" case study.

- Thank you...
